data.fullContent: Chinese dynasties always had a problem with their northern neighbors, the Mongols, but they often put down the rebellions and raids their neighbors put out. It was not only until the 1100s did the Chinese really start to fear the growing power of the Mongols, under their leader, Genghis Khan. The Song dynasty managed to survive in the south for another 100 years, until the Mongols, under Kublai Khan, successfully invaded and conquered the Song. This is when Kublai Khan began the Yuan dynasty(1271 to 1368), which lasted for about 100 years, and stretched further on all sides than modern China today.
data.answer: 中国各朝代与北方邻国蒙古人之间一直存在矛盾，但他们经常镇压叛乱，并对邻国发动袭击。直到12世纪10年代，中国人才真正开始害怕在成吉思汗领导下的蒙古人日益强大的势力。宋朝成功地在南方生存了100年，直到忽必烈汗领导下的蒙古人成功地入侵并征服了宋朝。这是忽必烈汗开始元朝(1271年到1368年)，持续了大约100年，延伸的范围比现代中国的今天还要广。
